actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT wt.uuid AS uuid, wtpa.uuid AS wt_pack, wtpa.payload_post AS pack_post, wtpo.uuid AS wt_post, wttz.uuid AS wt_tz, tz.uuid AS tz, tz.payload AS tz_payload, wtes.uuid AS wt_es, wtes.settings AS es_settings, wtst.uuid AS wt_stack, pp.name AS project_place

FROM public."wt" wt

LEFT JOIN public."wt_pack" wtpa ON wtpa.uuid = wt.wt_pack AND wtpa.active = true AND wtpa.deleted = false

LEFT JOIN public."project_place" pp ON pp.uuid = wtpa.project_place AND pp.active = true AND pp.deleted = false

LEFT JOIN public."wt_post" wtpo ON wtpo.wt = wt.uuid AND wtpo.active = true AND wtpo.deleted = false

LEFT JOIN public."wt_tz" wttz ON wttz.wt = wt.uuid AND wttz.active = true AND wttz.deleted = false

LEFT JOIN public."tz" tz ON wttz.tz = tz.uuid AND tz.active = true AND tz.deleted = false

LEFT JOIN public."mf_project_post_type" mfppt ON mfppt.uuid = tz.mf_project_post_type AND mfppt.active = true AND mfppt.deleted = false

LEFT JOIN public."_mf_post_type" mfpt ON mfpt.uuid = mfppt.mf_post_type AND mfpt.active = true AND mfpt.deleted = false

LEFT JOIN public."wt_execution_settings" wtes ON wtes.wt = wt.uuid AND wtes.active = true AND wtes.deleted = false

LEFT JOIN public."wt_stack" wtst ON wtst.wt = wt.uuid AND wtst.active = true AND wtst.deleted = false

WHERE pp.project = '{{Select1Copy.selectedOptionValue}}'
ORDER BY wt.uuid
LIMIT 100;
